message: Why is the posting denied in the fraudulent tech company post?

data.message: Because comments started being abusive and not relevant to the original post
the abuse stopped, we are talking about banning the guy from the groups

In fact it is funny because when I was trying to comment on the post I was just about to say this is the first time I have seen Egyptians taking positive action, usually they take the side of the aggressor or they tell the person who has rights that it is the way he asked for the rights that stopped him from getting his rights, I was commending the people in the post for taking positive action and here come the Admins and take the ultimate negative action. No wonder we never get anywhere in this country!

Muhammad Al Rabbani our group is for tech information sharing and not fraud reports. We are very strict with the Group rules to make sure the quality we are seeking is achieved. There are many ways to report this issues but unfortunately our group is not that place.

I just happened to find something similar on stackexchange and the question wasn't closed, although they have stricter rules than this group. I think we shouldn't deny the posting, but I agree to delete any abusive comments http://serverfault.com/questions/293217/our-security-auditor-is-an-idiot-how-do-i-give-him-the-information-he-wants
